Key Match Events: Juan Soto hit a three-run homer with two outs in the 10th inning to send the Yankees to the World Series
Post-Match Reflections: The Guardians' surprising season under first-year manager Stephen Vogt ended just short of a World Series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees will try to win their 28th title against either the New York Mets or Los Angeles Dodgers
Others: The Yankees won the first two games at Yankee Stadium without much fanfare or any major drama, but it was a different story in Cleveland as all three games at Progressive Field were nail-biters
